CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Assignment_Agreement__c)), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Assignment_Agreement__r.Status,"Draft")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Assignment_Agreement__r.Status,"Rejected")) ) ), true, false )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: True if this contract is linked to a client assignment agreement, unless the assignment agreement has Status = Draft or Rejected
CustomField.label: Assigned to Client
